resources.string: Alerts the user to perform wellness check

Will you be my Emergency Contact for the Wellness Check app?
 
 Reply:
 Y1 to accept and rate me as low risk
 Y2 to accept and rate me as medium risk
 Y3 to accept and rate me as high risk
 No to decline
 
 Low Risk allows me to turn off my own wellness checks
 Medium Risk requires permission from one of my Emergency Contacts to turn off wellness checks
 High risk requires permission from all of my Emergency Contacts to turn off wellness checks
May I turn off my wellness checks? Reply: Yes or No
